entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 8:18 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
